analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol:
	Contract GhtToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol#103-104)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol#43) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of GhtToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol#190-191) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of GhtToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol#191) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of GhtToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol#209-210) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of GhtToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol#210) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of GhtToken.burn (/unique_chucks/40/0xe2073356c7ced54099df5f09afc4df18fb1398ac.sol#228-229) is not in mixedCase
